markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Elemental Tsunami](/Monsters.aspx?ID=200)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Elemental tsunamis are huge and destructive.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 28

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 26

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 11">[Elemental Tsunami](/Monsters.aspx?ID=200)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Aquatic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=168" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=57" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 153</row>

**Perception** +22; darkvision

**Languages**
[Aquan](/Languages.aspx?ID=14)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +23, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +23

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +6

**Con** +6

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Water-Bound** When not touching water, the elemental tsunami is slowed 1 and can’t use reactions.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 31 

**Fort** +21 

**Ref** +22 

**Will** +19 

</row>

**HP** 195

**Immunities**
bleed, paralyzed, poison, sleep

**Resistances**
fire 10

**Vortex** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165)) 50 feet. Water in the area that is in the same body of water as the elemental tsunami is difficult terrain for Swimming creatures that don’t have the water trait.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 35 feet, swim 100 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
wave +24 ([reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d12+12 bludgeoning plus Push or Pull 10 feet

**Drench** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165)) The elemental puts out all fires in a 20-foot emanation. It extinguishes all non-magical fires automatically and attempts to counteract magical fires (+20 counteract modifier).

**Surge** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The elemental tsunami quickly expands its space to fill the area of its vortex. Creatures within the vortex’s emanation take 5d12+6 bludgeoning damage (DC 31 basic Fortitude save). A creature that fails this save is Pushed 20 feet. The elemental tsunami then retracts to its former space. The elemental tsunami can’t Surge again for 1d4 rounds.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-45" />
name: Elemental Tsunami
